`GEOG346coursework` is a package which includes all the course work related to GEOG346 - Geospatial analysis with R.

Functions available in the package:

`my_number_checker`

This function checks if the number is too low, just right or too high.

```{r}

library(GEOG346coursework)

my_number_checker(4)
my_number_checker(9)
my_number_checker(458)
```

`squirrel_function`

This function allows (defaults to true) you to express your admiration for squirrels 

```{r}

library(GEOG346coursework)

squirrel_function()
```

More functions coming soon!
